snippet.title: A Revamped Version of Sonic Colors
snippet.description:
This video shows off Sonic Colors DX, a HD Graphic Overhaul Mod for Sonic Colors Wii / Dolphin, with a High-Poly Sonic Model, Better Lighting, HD Textures and UI, 60FPS Gameplay etc...
#SonicTheHedgehog #SonicColorsDX #SonicMods

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒

✦ Sonic Hacking Contest 2021 (SHC2021)
- https://shc.zone/
- https://twitter.com/shcontest

✦ Sonic Colors DX Mod by @threethan
(threethan's Gamebanana Member Page)
- https://gamebanana.com/members/1754488
(Mod Release Page)
- https://gamebanana.com/mods/325588

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒

⏱ Timestamps
00:00 Intro
00:15 Title Screen
00:26 Tropical Resort Act 1
02:11 Sweet Mountain Act 3
03:38 Starlight Carnival Act 5
06:08 Planet Wisp Act 1
08:03 Aquarium Park Act 1
10:49 Asteroid Coaster Act 1
13:42 Outro

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒

▷ Enjoying this video?
Hit that 𝗹𝗶𝗸𝗲 button!

✦ 𝗦𝘂𝗯𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗯𝗲 to the channel ✦
- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQjABsDvQs4idH56oxcGcEQ?sub_confirmation=1

✮ If you 𝗿𝗲𝗮𝗹𝗹𝘆 enjoy my content and want to support me even more, become a member, by clicking on the 𝗝𝗼𝗶𝗻 button.
- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQjABsDvQs4idH56oxcGcEQ/join

▶ Follow me on 𝗧𝘄𝗶𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿
- https://twitter.com/BlueVivacity
▶ Follow me on 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺
